I've had this laptop for only a week now but I've had it running pretty hard with all apps open and it'll just get hot, but you can't hear the fan or computer running. This is perfect for when I'm in class taking notes because I don't get distracted or annoy others by the computer being loud and disruptive. I only have two complaints: 1) the laptop heats up pretty fast but it doesn't burn your leg or anything and 2) the battery indicator is very indecisive, meaning that the "Calculated Time Remaining..." isn't too accurate and it'll show only 4 hours left after I've completed a full charge and have my keyboard lights off and my screen at half brightness. Despite the battery life indicator, the laptop (at half screen brightness and half or less keyboard brightness) gets well over 8 hours of battery life, as advertised by Apple, which is PERFECT for me. I don't think a Mac is worth the $1000 but I do not regret spending it on this laptop one bit! Thank you, Apple, for creating a computer I can actually deal with!

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Brrr in Colorado
Reviews.Content: Like it. It did everything we expected! The seller did not provide tracking number which was weird, but the Mac Pro was in good shape upon arrival.

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro MD101LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop[NEWEST VERSION]
Reviews.Author: store avoider
Reviews.Content: Great picture. I like the lighted screen at night. Very fast for everything. No trouble viewing YouTube. Starts up fast. No trouble with anything on it. It was a great buy. I like it better than my old Mac-which I loved. I have never gotten a virus on it.

Reviews.Title: one of the best purchases of my life
Reviews.Author: Luis Pizarro Salom "chavela"
Reviews.Content: The product was sold used like new, and honestly it was exactly the same that buying it new, it was in perfect condition, no scratches, everything as described, with all the accessories, I'm completely satisfied with this product and with the seller.

Reviews.Title: Highy recommended, exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Halla Margrét Hinriksdóttir
Reviews.Content: Great service, highly recommended. It totally exceeded my expectations. Everything in the description is consistent to the product I got.

Reviews.Title: Important Note Please Read
Reviews.Author: thundercloud "C.B."
Reviews.Content: I am one of those people who had the problematic 2010 version of the MacBook Pro. The ones that overheated and died an early death. Also based on my past excellent experience with mac computers I did not purchase an extended warranty. My MacBook Pro died about a month ago and I almost did not get another one. Unfortunately I had become a mac addict because when a Mac works it works very well. My Windows based computers were always crashing, usually about every three months. The worst a Mac ever did to me was freeze up.My new Macbook Pro arrived yesterday. I normally DO NOT write a review until after I have used an item and on a computer I wait 3 months. I am breaking that rule today because there has been some IMPORTANT CHANGES that I feel people need to know about especially those folks like me who have had a bad experience with this line of macs.This Macbook Pro RUNS FAR COOLER than any mac I have ever owned EVEN WHEN THEY WERE NEW. This might be because of the new i5 processor. It might be because Apple re-engineered them and cured whatever it was that caused the problem. I don't know. All I know is that even my longest lasting macs always ran fairly warm and that 2010 model ran hot all the time. In my opinion this should make these new macs run far longer than the old ones especially if you get the solid state drive( I did not).This Macbook Pro has my other Macs beat on speed even when they were new.I will update this review and report any problems I come across. If you see no updates it's good news. One thing is for sure. With this Mac I am purchasing the extended warranty through Squaretrade. Apples warranty is too expensive and only runs 3 years. At one time they offered 5 years. The Squaretrade warranty goes up to 4 years and is about $50 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Nice Apple Machine For Great Price
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: I searched many websites and only Amazon had low price for this Apple Machine. I am loving the fast performance also. Amazon rocks.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: John McKenna
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece.  Not only was she suprised, she tells me every time I see her how happy she is with it.

Reviews.Title: Best laptop ever!
Reviews.Author: Yaron Goldstein
Reviews.Content: Best laptop ever created as of yet!Usability, design, speed, battery life, sharp display, amazing touch pad and what not ...

Reviews.Title: Speechless
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: I'm photographer and like most of the beginners, I started with a very basic computer, actually old... Very old pc (windows 7). Don't misunderstand, I'm not saying I'm super professional and I'm still learning, but I get paid for the job I do (weddings, food photography, etc)So, when upgraded to this jewel I just got speechless because of the speed on each task with large files (.tiff) dimensions 6 x 3 ft. With software like photoshop and above after effects, etc.I'm very happy... I love this computer and definitely recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop, but a bit overpriced for the specs
Reviews.Author: Gerome
Reviews.Content: Overall a good laptop, not great. Strong build though which really adds to its durability. Girlfriend dropped the laptop while using it from around 4 feet, the glass cracked, but the screen was still in tact. I would have to say that's a big pro.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Bryan 418
Reviews.Content: This is my first Mac and I couldn't be more in love with it. I've made many digs against Mac people in the past but I now understand why they love Mac because its nice having something that works and doesn't freeze up like my PC would. I also am glad that I have this and not one of those horrid windows 8 computers because that OS is dreadful.

Reviews.Title: Best Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Naveen Prasanth S.K.V.
Reviews.Content: I am a college student and I needed a computer that is long lasting through my career so I picked the macbook pro. This is the best decision I have made in my life! I have been a PC user for a very long time and all my PC's got viruses so had to replace them every 2-3 years. And the best thing about MAC's is you don't get VIRUSES!!! This is definitely worth the purchase

Reviews.Title: Great size. No iBook reading. Steep learning curve.
Reviews.Author: Charles Redd
Reviews.Content: Since I have iPhone, iPad and iPod I thought that my next computer should be a MacBook Pro. Took a long time trying to decide between one with retina display and one without. Next had to decide between 13 or 15. Chose the 13 non retina display  and glad that I did. Biggest disappointment is that I cannot read the iBooks I purchase from Apple on this machine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product. Lives up to expectation of Apple products
Reviews.Author: william bland
Reviews.Content: Sold on all Apple products. Have two ipads,two macbooks,an imac 27",ipod nano and an iphone in thefamily and am completely sold on their quality, value, and ability to retain their value.

Reviews.Title: I walked into the Mac experience wanting to like it.
Reviews.Author: BSG
Reviews.Content: This is my first Mac and it's really just an expensive experiment. I still have to use my two other windows machines to get most of my work done because, as much of a pleasure as the Mac is to use, it's not worth re-purchasing of a ton of software. One thing I am still happy about is the price I paid at Amazon. I had been watching the prices for six months and a brick and mortar store (rhymes with Test Fry) put it on sale the week of Thanksgiving. Amazon's prices can change by the minute and for about two hours, the price dropped as low as it had ever been and matched the Test Fry price. Even though I can't use it for work much, I am still glad I made the purchase. The best features to me are the multiple desktops, the swipe gestures, and the seamless way they work together. Also, the way it works with Apple TV is nothing short of amazing. The more Apple products you have, the more it sense it makes to acquire more. And lets face it, reading these reviews isn't really going to sway you on the product, only on where you purchase it. And with my Amazon Prime membership (the best $79 I've spent in years) buying it here was a no-brainer. $3.99 got it here overnight. Any repairs are going to have to be made by Apple anyway and who wants to deal with a pretentious "Apple Genius". I prefer "Google Genius". Oh, and a Book Book is worth the price. They sell that here too.

Reviews.Title: Best MacBook
Reviews.Author: Gerardo C. Guzman Lozano
Reviews.Content: I wont write too much, Apple just builts the best computers, you cant go wrong with this computer. Buy the separate RAM memory and you will have a rocket!

Reviews.Title: Best......Thing.....EVER!!!!!
Reviews.Author: devante franklin
Reviews.Content: Ok i've been a PC for years....mostly because I couldnt afford a mac. so when I had the money to buy one I bought other things instead....a 700 laptop and some extra stuff with it. but now that im starting a business I needed something that was reliable because my laptop started to slow down horribly.....so that when I remembered...ive never heard of a mac slowing down or crashing after a few months ( replaced my pc hard drive after about a year). so I saw this one didnt know much about them but bought the newest version on the first buy....I did a good job lol this mac is awesome. HD graphics, clean and stylish look, built very well, and it even runs on the same internet in the same house almost 3x as fast as my pc and even picks up more signal from the access points than my pc....yea wont say all is great though the whole holding ctrl+left click was a little annoying. had to ask a guy in starbucks how to do it then i learned the double finger click but all in all this mac is awesome. webistires even look better on this thing. im only using this for business basically so Im hoping for some good years with no big problems...total 5 stars on this. full recommendation....probably should have checked apples sight before i bought here but oh well i love it anyway. new box and everything.

Reviews.Title: Love it.......nice and fast
Reviews.Author: J-Man
Reviews.Content: I love are 15 inch MacBook Pro! its so easy to use compared to a windows computer! And its SO fast with that i7 processor!PROS: Its very fast, a great computer for photo editing, a bunch of cool little bells and whistles (like the hot corners and the dashboard....ect!!!)CONS: Price is a bit ridiculous, kinda heavy (but not to bad by any means.)CONCLUSION: For anyone who does photo editing this is the computer your looking for, VERY fast and fun!!!

Reviews.Title: Works great !
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: I had never considered buying a Mac because of the high price. However, after having several other Apple devices over the years and enjoying the lack of errors and problems with the devices and the OS's, I gave it more consideration as I approached buying my very first laptop (after having over 20 years experience on desktop PC's).  I saved about $300 buying it on Amazon rather than elsewhere (no sales tax, big discount and $3.99 overnight shipping with Prime). The machine is brand new and it came installed with the Mountain Lion OS.The screen is excellent, it boots up fast. USB 3.0 is very fast. The trackpad works far better than I had anticipated. The gestures are amazing. The OS is very different than Windows, but is not hard to navigate. I store my regular 'Work in Process' documents on Dropbox, so those were a cinch to pull over. I still have to migrate my pictures and music to the machine. All of my bookmarks in Safari that I created over the years on the iPad pulled over seamlessly. The integration with my other Apple products via iCloud is outstanding.Everything from the box, the instructions, initial setup, downloading and installing software, the navigation of the OS....it all has a consistent and polished look.  Before i bought this I felt like I was getting the 'low end' laptop from Apple. After using it for a few days I am in awe of the performance and design. The screen is the perfect size and everything pops on it. It is very thin and quiet! I haven't heard a fan yet. This is money well spent. Thanks!Update 1: I upgraded my RAM to 8 gigs and this laptop is blazing fast!!! I can't believe it had the impact that it does. If this machine continued to run just like it does now, I won't need to upgrade for years to come. I used the Crucial brand and recommended specs so I don't screw with the warranty.

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro
Reviews.Author: Bill D. Gaiche
Reviews.Content: My new laptop is great. It has so much more speed and the screen is very sharp. Downloads are real fast compared to my netbook, no comparison. I have to admit that the operating system is different and does take time to learn but I like it. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: PC to Mac
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I purchase the Macbook Pro 13.3-Inch Laptop about a week ago and the experience has been great. I was a little worry at first because I don't have a lot of experience with os.x and windows has always been second nature to me after many years of using windows. For anybody that feels like switching from windows to apple let me tell you that it took me a couple of days to get used to this operating system but now I love it. First of all, the trackpad on the Macbook Pro is easy to use and after you learn all the gestures to use the trackpad you will see that this is a great way to use you computer. The computer itself is very well built and the keyboard is great to type on for a long period of time. Lastly, bootcamp is one of the main reasons I switch to Macbook Pro because you can run window 7 or any windows operating system you want on your Macbook Pro.

Reviews.Title: Another Apple Success!!
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: More and more I am falling in love with Apple products!  I bought this for my daughter sweet 16 bday and she loves it!  Very satisfied and will continue purchasing apple products for sure!  Now to buy the office/student word software!

Reviews.Title: Best laptop
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn Marie Valladares
Reviews.Content: After buy a mac I won't use another brand. Its sleek, pretty, and fast. It's a bit heavy and the cover and get grubby but all laptops require a basic cleaning every once in awhile. So far so good

Reviews.Title: I love my Mac!
Reviews.Author: melanie
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I wanted, in great condition. Absolutely perfect.  Super fast, lots of memory and it looks nice

Reviews.Title: liked it, but i wish it would have come with a clean load of OSX
Reviews.Author: Zachary
Reviews.Content: The Mac itself was in overall good shape. However, I did have to do some leg work getting the hard drive cleared of previous users data. I would have much preferred to get it with a new, clean load of OS X.

Reviews.Title: Love it great computer
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong with a macbook pro excellent product can't recommend enough. A wonderful base computer perfect for work or school with enough storage to most anything.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Judith Dishinger
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted.  Will not go back to a PC after using this apple Mac Pro.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Connolly Riley
Reviews.Content: These guys are great! Absolutely nothing but nice people and just willing to satisfy the customer! Took care of everything and made it easy as pie for me!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: mohamed
Reviews.Content: Very high quality product . I did not find any proplem with it. Long life battery . High performance . You will like to buy it . Or it's higher versions

Reviews.Title: Bought for my Daughter
Reviews.Author: sharring09
Reviews.Content: My daughter insisted I get this for her while she attends college.  She is still using it a year later and it seems to be in good condition and she loves using it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Elijah Peterson
Reviews.Content: The computer worked great!! It is everything I was looking for. It has some really cool features. Definitely top of the line.

Reviews.Title: Very good operating system and quick
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: My fisrt Apple computer did not disappoint.  I am not techy,but for the most did not need to be one to use it.  My only complaint is that the initial load came with no insturctions, the start-up steps are not intuitive and it is the least streamlined part of the Mac experience.  Surprising from Apple.  However, once past that process you will find the rest easy and fun.  Learn to sue the command key, it is very useful over several of the software programs that come with the hardware.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly, in great condition!
Reviews.Author: Ed M
Reviews.Content: No complaints here. Arrived in great condition and perfect working order. It was advertised as "Used" but it looks and feels brand new. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Stephen W. Riley
Reviews.Content: There is nothing to beat Apple, but it would be even better if it would accept programs from other developers more easily!

Reviews.Title: Never go back
Reviews.Author: James "James"
Reviews.Content: I used to buy a new laptop every three years and spend about $600-800 each time. My friend convinced me to get the iMac and I am very happy with my purchase. I paid about twice what I usually pay for a laptop but I can tell thus will last me over seven years. It takes a bit getting used to coming from a pc, but it is well worth it. Ask anyone who has a iMac, they will never go back to pc again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: Go computer no problems at all and i never have a macbook pro before and now i am in loved with this computer i am a dj and this computer is great for deejaying great i make a great decision

Reviews.Title: Excellent shape outside--inside required servicing
Reviews.Author: BobW "Robert Webster"
Reviews.Content: The MacBook is just what I wanted, fast, ample memory, OSX Maverick, like-new condition,and delivered on time.The only problem encountered was that it had not been wiped clean of all programs from the formerowner.  This caused big problems with my passwords and attempts to install my programs.  Had totake it to an Apple store locally for service before I could really call it "mine".

Reviews.Title: MBPro 13, A-1278, MD102LL/A, 750GB HDD, i7, 8GB RAM
Reviews.Author: Thomas Bangash "THBangash"
Reviews.Content: It may say to be the OLD Version, as the so-called Newer Version is available, thou that is not the true statement, as the Newer is not with the same configuration, not even close.The primary reason for me wanting this rather Former Model instead of the NEW Model (Retina) was the Configuration itself, and the UPGRADABILITY of it, which is almost NON Exsistant in the Retina Models.After decades of Pure PC usage, it does take a bit time to get use to the new OS and the way things work in this one compare to Windows, but that sort of applies to every change over.The integration of the system on my domestic set-up, consisting of almost purely Apple Products, from router to Systems, and Peripheral iOS units like the IPads, IPhones and IPods, went smoothly,

Reviews.Title: Great deal 4 me, but sloooow delivery
Reviews.Author: Doctor Plenty
Reviews.Content: The non-Amazon dealer (Hustle Double*, I believe) was absolutely great.  I would absolutely recommend him (I think) as a 2nd party seller.  Very trustworthy.  Except my package was not sent off on date promised.  But in the long view, for what I got, that was relatively minor once the computer did arrive (about five days later than I expected)  I'm typing this on my almost MacBook Pro right now!!*don't be put off by the name, it's a baseball reference

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: DJ IIJIMA
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my granddaughter she just loves it. we went through many different brands of laptops and was notsatisfied with it, but the Apple Mac is wonderful. I am thinking of getting another soon. definitely will recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Another Gift
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my niece and she uses it all the time.  Could not be more happy just loves her MAC

Reviews.Title: As reliable and functional as the older models
Reviews.Author: David D.
Reviews.Content: I needed to buy this unit to replace my six year old Apple MacBook Pro.  It has all the same feature with updates on the plug-ins and other newer technology.  Can't go wrong with Apple products because they are built well and Apple has great customer support.  I left off the last star because of price.  I hate paying a lot for a product like this, but it is worth it I guess.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Carla O'Brien
Reviews.Content: Great price.. brand new.  LOVE IT…. don't know if I'll ever go back to a PC.  Very easy to use and was comfortable after just a day with it.Not well versed in computers either, so If I can handle a Macbook Pro…you can too.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Sergio Quiroga
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect lap top for us.  This one still has the CD slot.  The picture and apps work great.  Glad I switched from a pc.

Reviews.Title: Great Hardware to work with Audio Production
Reviews.Author: Mariano Andres Ponz
Reviews.Content: This is my first macbook and I am very happy of it as it made me available to work professionally with audio software as it has solid and fast components.  I updated the RAM to 16gb which is the maximum you can have in this macbook.  Is practical to carry it anywhere, the trackpad's shortcuts are awesome as they make a faster experience of it.I recommend this article to everyone who is interested in having a complete laptop to work and also to for ordinary use.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Susan Gregg
Reviews.Content: Got it fast! its as advertised on here..... it works great and is not a waste of money! I cant say anything bad about buying this item from this seller

Reviews.Title: It's a Mac!
Reviews.Author: aindelicato
Reviews.Content: I love my Macbook, just hate the price.. comparatively, you can buy 3 decent Windows laptops for the same price as a Macbook.  Runs good and does the job, can't complain about that!

Reviews.Title: get one it is worth the money
Reviews.Author: RUSTY
Reviews.Content: it a mac what more needs to be said, this is so much better than i ever could have imagined

Reviews.Title: Easy set up and features are great.
Reviews.Author: wickless "scent girl"
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves this and I have to say I was impressed with it.  He is a big gamer and loves all the features.

Reviews.Title: wooohoo!
Reviews.Author: Leander Gilua
Reviews.Content: amazing! i love my new laptop! works great and perfect! cant stop using it! must buy! and it came early than expected! such a great service!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased :)
Reviews.Author: Diep Ta
Reviews.Content: This Macbook works like a charm and looks almost good as new, minus some cosmetic scratches that are barely visible. My used macbook also came with a charger that has an extension cord to it! I am more than happy with my purchase of this product.

Reviews.Title: great computer... all around.
Reviews.Author: John Benda
Reviews.Content: Works great as second work computer. And portable all purpose machine - even movies and book downloads. Great computer for all around use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: Krystal D. Watson "Kwatson"
Reviews.Content: The item received was exactly as identified.  Also, there was a negative experience that was quickly transformed into a positive experience. The item was to originally be received by a specific date; however, due to the items being damaged in transit, Amazon promptly contacted me and notified of its status and immediately re-shipped a new item at no additional cost, which was received on time.  I was really impressed with the communication and services received with this purchase.Also, the specs of this laptop are perfect for the purpose intended, which is to cater to my educational requirements; furthermore, due to its high capabilities it can also be recommended for a small home business.I definitely will recommend this purchase and amazon to anyone!! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product, but with few initial hiccups
Reviews.Author: Hamid Azmi
Reviews.Content: I love it. This is the first time for me to use a Mac and I'm really happy with the move. It's durable and fast with excellent graphics. That said, in the short time that I've been using it, it has crashed twice and that's something that bothers me, because I thought was something I should not expect with a Mac.

Reviews.Title: Love the looks and the performance
Reviews.Author: hc
Reviews.Content: Good in every aspect. With the softwares supporting the use of other OS makes it much better.May its heavier and costlier but cant complain

Reviews.Title: Gift for grandson
Reviews.Author: celnegdo
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my grand son. I was amazed at how fast the delivery was. He said he loves it and has been very helpful in his art class.

Reviews.Title: If you can afford it, this is the choice
Reviews.Author: Zora
Reviews.Content: I deal with both Macs and PCs and for a Laptop to be so problem free is just refreshing. All of my Laptops that are PCs have been sent to the shop this year and are brand new (no older than 1 year). For some reason Macs just aren't prone to catching viruses and the operating system is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Love this computer
Reviews.Author: Magdalena del Olmo
Reviews.Content: It is perfect. My son needs it for his school and it also serves our personal needs. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: My dream machine
Reviews.Author: J. Oakley
Reviews.Content: Having had the SSD on my 2010 Macbook Air fail twice in a year I was very concerned about the reliability - and fixability - of the Macbook Airs so I traded up to a regular hard drive (750GB) Macbook Pro. I was concerned that the downgrade to the regular hard drive would make it unacceptably slow but I need not have worried - this machine is the fastest I have ever owned... and with 8GB of RAM I can run a Windows 7 guest machine in seamless mode all the time... and it gives me the fastest Windows machine I've ever owned too!I am in heaven.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M. Moresi "Jman"
Reviews.Content: PRO:I love the product itself and I had great service from Amazon.CON:I don't know if the "spacebar" being curved as a mount and the "7" key's point of the keyboard's backlight subtly dimmer than the rest of the keyboard is the way Apple wants it or just some other unstable matter occurred during the whole shipping process. I understand I should call Apple Tech Support about any variables(which is my purpose of writing this con) as variables could be a bigger future problem.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Revman67
Reviews.Content: I've been  using mac for over 10 years and will always use mac! The new os is great on my macbook pro!

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook Pro is great
Reviews.Author: as&bg
Reviews.Content: This Apple has exceeded our expectations. Sure it's not light & slim but the features make up for it 100%. Solid, fast & very reliable for many applications. From student to business usage.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS COMPUTER
Reviews.Author: Yefim Gorelik
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY THIRD MACBOOK....I LOVE IT.EASY TO USE AND LOOKS GOOD.ONE THING BAD IS EVERYWHERE YOU GO, EVERYONE HAS THESEE COMPUTERS.

Reviews.Title: Our first Mac
Reviews.Author: Mike Raivala
Reviews.Content: This is our first Mac, I have had an iPhone for many years but never the computers.  It takes some getting used too but really love the photo book my wife created on it.  It is amazing!

Reviews.Title: My apple
Reviews.Author: Lillian Ouellette
Reviews.Content: The laptop came in with all the expectations I had imagined. So glad I have gone this route!! Would recommend  to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: JOHN GROSSHEIM
Reviews.Content: Great looking computer and can go wrong with buying the latest apple that is on the market today and price

Reviews.Title: Fast and efficient!
Reviews.Author: ALFREDO GOMEZ
Reviews.Content: Speakers could be betterOutstanding design and thin housing, small massit may be expensive but definitely worth it every dime. totally recommended

Reviews.Title: i upgraded from macbook greater than ten years old
Reviews.Author: petero
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the macbookpro it's faster and has a beautiful displaymy old computer still works but could not keep up due to memory etccan't beat a mac!!!!

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: zach
Reviews.Content: This computer is fast and amazing! A few of my friends have custom built desktops that cost them over 2k and my laptop can keep up with their computers! Love this computer!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Wonderful
Reviews.Content: Shipped on time and was well packed. Couldn't have asked for more! The computer was well within my price range and the one day ship option was great for me because I needs it right away.

Reviews.Title: I love my computer
Reviews.Author: MaryAnn Jackman
Reviews.Content: I thought about buying a Mac for a long time and did some research into it. My aging PC was misbehaving all the time -- cursor jumping, skipping to a new page without my initiating it, losing my work... so many times I would whisper to it, Mac...Mac...Mac...and finally I decided to do it.I love my iPhone, and because I was used to that, learning the Mac was very easy. The icons are the same and the way it operates is very similar. It is designed to be user-friendly. I was fully able to use it comfortably within an hour.I chose the 13.3 inch laptop because I thought that was a good size for me, and I chose the 8 gigabyte memory and more powerful processor because I think as programs and operating systems that need more power and memory come along, it will be adaptable and consequently will last longer. Another deciding factor in which version to buy was going to the Apple website and seeing what the 4 gig model with the less powerful processor would cost with double the memory. Their price turned for that out to be the same as the Amazon price for the one with the more powerful processor and the 8 gig memory.  I chose the one without retina display, and having seen both side by side at the local Mac store, I am really happier with the non-retina display model. I think the picture is actually sharper, in spite of what they say about the retina display.I am a writer and take some online classes, and it works beautifully for both. I can do my work and store it on the iCloud. It has an excellent sound system and will play CDs. That's another reason I chose this model rather than the Mac Air, which has no slot for CDs.Some things I don't like about it are lack of a way to delete the words or letters in front of the cursor instead of just the words or letters behind it, and not being able to play Cubis on it. (Cubis has never made a Mac version.) The things I love about it far outweigh this.The battery lasts for about 7 or 8 hours of continuous work and recharges quickly. I am really, really happy I got this computer.

Reviews.Title: Way too good
Reviews.Author: waterballs87

Reviews.Title: As expected, It's great
Reviews.Author: Raama Srivatsan
Reviews.Content: Where to begin?Build Quality:As is expected, It's made with the highest quality in materials. Soft touch, anodized aluminum with laser cut precision and no flaws. I love the little rubber seam that runs all the way around the edge of the screen that protects the screen from being scratched by the palm pads of the inner side. The keys are durable, and only start to wear out (become shiny) after about 1,000,000 hours of continuous use. I have another 2008 Black MacBook That has seen the most lengthy writing sessions with much sweating upon, and the keys still feel as good as new. I don't like the fact that the Screen is a fingerprint and dust magnet, but I fix that by wiping the screen down as a thing I do every Saturday Morning. The paint indicators on the side of the MacBook indicating which port is which has slowly become rubbed out from abrasion, but I know what port is now, so its ok. I wish I still had the paint in case I needed to sell it. The fan exhaust is located right under the screen hinge, and since it is easily covered, the laptop easily heats up. The trackpad is as smooth as velvet. I wish it was a entire button, so the trackpad wouldnt have to bend down when you press it at the top, but I've gotten used to the old way of thinking and using my thumb as a button-presser.Software:I can't say muchI love Macintosh. Grew up with it from OS 8I love how seamless and flawless it is. I can't wait for Mavericks, and I know it'll be a bestseller.I really love the fact that Mac has an app store with its constantly growing database, and great games.I wish iLife came hooked up to your account as soon as you enter your apple id with icloud so you can update it as part of your app collection, but since it doesnt cost that much, its coolHardware:Apple always has bleeding edge performance and I love their support of everything out thereMy Mac rarely ever lags, and even when it does, (unless the fan is blocked), the fan is almost unnoticeable. I've heard that they fixed the problem with the new Retina Display MacBook Pro though with the adjusted frequency fans. I really want to try that out for my self.I also love the super fast Ivy Bridge 2.6 Ghz processor with Great battery life.They only fact that I wish they had done was refresh the ENTIRE Mac lineup along with the MacBook Air's when they changed the processors to Haswell.Overall:I love this product.I love appleJust wish they continued the color variety.I dont know how much effort it would take to make an anodized black macbook pro, macbook air, and a iMac, but if they did, I know that if they did, people would trip over each other just to get their hands on one of themI know I would.So until that happens, I'm sticking with this.

Reviews.Title: 99% Worth It
Reviews.Author: M. Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I have always loved Mac, and I found that it was time to upgrade from my MacBook to one that was more robust (2.9GHz processing power). The performance is definitely superior to any computer I've ever put my hands on.So why 99% instead of 100? Well, I use my MacBook Pro a lot to record audio. The description said that the headphone jack also doubled as an audio input, and that it could be reversed in system preferences. But guess what? ... Not true! To my dismay, I have been unable to use the audio port as an input, despite Apple having advertised it as such. I searched online to figure out what I was doing wrong, and lo and behold, everyone is having the same problem. (FYI, this problem is apparently exclusive to OSX Mountain Lion)However, since the problem appears to be software related, I am hopeful that Apple will release a fix soon. Apart from my frustration over the false advertising in that area, I am otherwise satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Apple quality declining but still light years better than a PC!
Reviews.Author: sarmomemt "sarmomemt"
Reviews.Content: I have been a loyal Mac user since 2001 & have never looked back. I bought this Mac book pro along with a new 27" iMac & while they are still light years more reliable than a PC I have noticed a decline in the reliability of my Mac computers. The problem for me has been all with memory (ram) even with the ram maxed out on both computers I every once in a while have it lock up while editing photos (professional photographer) at first I thought aperture 3 was the problem, I switched over to Lightroom and there was a noticeable improvement but the problem remains. I have brought both in for service a number of times.- there was an issue with the seal on the monitor which caused dust to get under the screen- there was a problem with the screen refusing to wake from sleep modeEvery time apple handles the problem & fixes it for free. Apple products generally work out the small issues on their own, you only get problems when it's something big. Fortunately apples customer service is great.While I had my MacBook in for service I used my husbands HP laptop (similar specs) and there were many more quirks so overall I'm still happy with my purchase - apple still beats out windows/bios systems hands down but I would be lying if I said I wasn't concerned about the seemingly obvious decrease in quality over the years. I buy a new Mac every 2-3 years for work. With the needs of a professional photographer I generally need to keep up with the best specs. I've never had a pc live longer than that. I choose to upgrade, I don't have to. My first PowerBook stillWorks!

Reviews.Title: MacBook Pro as replacement for MacBook Air
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey White
Reviews.Content: Even though since 1984 I have directly purchased over 60 macintosh computers for private and business purposes and indirectly hundreds more to clients by recommendation. From 1988 to 2010 I was a graphic arts professional, electronically based on Macintosh computers, and a consultant to other such professionals in helping them deal with computers in their business. But when Apple walked away from supporting older software, some of which CANNOT be updated, by discontinuing Rosetta when they introduced their Lion operating system, I decided I would no longer purchase, support or recommend a Mac.Unfortunately my wife's 2009 MacBook Air developed a hardware problem that didn't seem worth repairing. I couldn't talk her out of another Mac, and very I'm sorry for that. This mac has been a problem since we got it. Even though it uses an I7 Intel processor, it is no faster and may be slower than the system it replaced. Startup times are incredibly long: over two minutes. This has to be because of software bloat from what I would argue is the worst MacOS since the original 128k mac introduced in 1984 (which I owned).Perhaps if you've never owned a computer, none of this would bother you, but if you come from an older mac or from the Windows side, the clunkiness and sloth will drive you nuts. In addition, of course, since pre-intel software is no longer supported, about 1/3 of my wife's programs were trashed. Some we could replace (the Office suite for $150 we didn't need because the version we had served her needs, but won't run on the new mac), while others have never and will never be updated. Fortunately we do have other older macs (Snow Leopard or earlier capable) so we can kludge.Recently however, this Macbook loses the ability to print to our network laser printer, a HP Color Laser Jet. The computer says it can't find the printer, even though it printed to it 10 minutes before, and other computers on the ethernet, both mac and windows, can also print to it. Given the way print spooling works the only reliable way to reestablish printing capability has been to trash the print que and create a new one. Sometimes this is possible through Bonjour (the Apple print protocol) or more likely it must be done via direct ip addressing, which in our local LAN with an address of 192.168.x.x, the computer thinks our printer is in Boise, Idaho! How stupid is that?By the way, when the print que is deleted to fix the printer, everything in that que is lost. Not a problem unless we were printing many pages from different web addresses which were sent to printer while we went on without keeping track. Rebuilding such a que is a pain.If you already have a Lion-based Mac, then getting this computer will not surprise you and you will probably find it very nice because you don't know any better. If you have an older mac, or a windows system, I strongly suggest you go to windows or stay there. You will be sadly disappointed with this.

Reviews.Title: Apple Macbook Pro 13in June release
Reviews.Author: Samuel Adams
Reviews.Content: Well let me start at the beginning.  I am a male in my mid 20's. For all of my life I have owned toshiba laptops. For the most part they have treated me well. But when it really came down to it they just were not very reliable. Sound board stopped working and the internal fans never seemed to keep the laptops cool enough.  I say all that to say this. Switching computer brands is one thing, but switching your OS is a much bigger step. This is the step i finally took. After buying a new Macbook Pro 13in I can say it has been the best purchase in electronics i have ever made. I am a man who loves to research and in all my searching I could not find a computer that is an equal to the macbook pro.I am 100% pleased with this purchase. It was far more then i though it would be.If you have any worries about buying it from Amazon just make sure that the one you are buying is sold by Amazon and not a 3rd party seller.
